attributes.additional_details: Read the full judgement of the Supreme Court: https://www.supremecourt.uk/cases/docs/uksc-2019-0192-judgment.pdf
attributes.background: The Supreme Court has ruled that Boris Johnson acted unlawfully in suspending parliament, finding the effect on our democracy was 'extreme'. His position as Prime Minister is now untenable. As British citizens concerned with defending democracy, we call on him to resign.

rejection.details:
The resignation of the Prime Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
